events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position at our company.
Your software engineering application has been reviewed and categorized appropriately within our recruitment system.
A recruiter has been assigned to facilitate your software engineer application and will be in touch shortly.
Your software engineering profile has passed the initial screening and meets our key requirements for the role.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions related to the software developer position.
Your technical interview for the software engineer vacancy has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC.
The technical interview was successfully completed and your coding and problem-solving skills were evaluated thoroughly.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview has been completed successfully, with an engaging discussion about your career goals and our company values.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer for the software engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer, expressing enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer for the engineering role, and we are excited to welcome you onboard.
The onboarding process has started, including orientation and setup for your software engineering role.
Hiring has been officially closed for the software engineering position and the new employee is fully integrated.
